metadata.title: CVE-2020-22021 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in FFmpeg 4.2 at filter_edges function in libavfilter/vf_yadif.c, which could let a remote malicious user cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3').
